description: If n=sum a_i b_i, (a_i,b_i positive integers) then a(n)=max value of min(all a_i and b_i).
maple: A046805 := proc(n)    local p,a,abmin,divmin;    a := 0 ;    for p in combinat[partition](n) do        abmin := 1+n ;        for abprod in p do            divmin := A033676(abprod) ;            abmin := min(abmin,divmin) ;        end do:        a := max(a,abmin) ;    end do:    a ;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 12 2015
author: _Erich Friedman_
